 Suggest a Book 
 
 
 
 For course-related requests, please visit:  Put Materials on Course Reserves 
 
 This site is for UCR affiliated individuals to request a single book only. 
 A UCR e-mail address is required for all submissions. 
 For other library material requests including two or more books/journals/databases, etc., please contact collection strategists for:
 
 Arts and Humanities Social Sciences and Area Studies Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM)
